articles.description: Follow live score & text updates as West Ham United play Arsenal and Manchester United face Newcastle in the fourth round of the EFL Cup.

articles.description: Listen to commentary of Celtic v St Mirren or Dundee v Rangers and follow live text updates of five Scottish Premiership matches.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Kick off delayed at Dens on five-game night

articles.description: South Africa are on the brink of clinching a World Cup semi-final berth after thrashing New Zealand by 190 runs.
articles.title: South Africa thrash New Zealand to close on semis

articles.description: England bowler David Willey will retire from international cricket at the end of the World Cup aged 33.
articles.title: Willey to retire from England duty after World Cup

articles.description: The FA is to write to all clubs advising players should not use the phrase 'from river to the sea' in social media posts.
articles.title: FA writes to clubs after Choudhury's Israel-Gaza post

articles.description: The England and Manchester United legend was living at a care home for patients with dementia.
articles.title: Sir Bobby Charlton died after fall, inquest hears

articles.description: Spain head coach Montse Tome says a "computer error" prevented Irene Paredes from making her 100th international appearance on Tuesday.
articles.title: Paredes denied 100th Spain cap by 'computer error'

articles.description: South Africa are on the brink of clinching a World Cup semi-final berth after a 190-run thrashing of New Zealand in Pune.
articles.title: South Africa beat New Zealand by 190 runs

articles.description: Aston Villa forward Alisha Lehmann reveals her secret talent, celeb followers and plays photo roulette in the fifth episode of Unlocked.
articles.title: Villa's Lehmann reveals her secret talent in Unlocked

articles.description: Sheffield Wednesday owner Dejphon Chansiri says the club have settled their bill with HM Revenue and Customs.
articles.title: Sheff Wed pay HMRC debt to come out of embargo
